about_the_game:
Cluck and conquer is a roguelite, micro-focused RTS where you command an army of battle-ready chickens. 

BA-KAW! King Featherington has appointed you as the new tactician for his army. You're in charge of recruiting new units, strategizing unit compositions, expanding your flock and most importantly, leading your feathery troops to victory!

Command at your own pace – whether you’re a seasoned RTS player seeking a fresh, unique twist on the genre or a beginner looking for a fun and approachable introduction to RTS.

MICRO YOUR WAY TO VICTORY

Prepare for battle by assembling your troops and crafting clever strategies to outsmart the opposition. With every unit having a counter, it’s up to you to tactically enlist the optimal units to defeat your enemies. Once the fight begins, use precise micro tactics to lead your chicken soldiers to triumph.

GROW YOUR FEATHERY LEGION

With each victory, you'll hatch stronger units and expand your coop to epic proportions. From noble chicken knights to beak-wielding kukri throwers, each new recruit will be cluckier and mightier than the last, building an unstoppable fowl force to conquer the battlefield!

UNLOCK EGG-CELLENT ENHANCEMENTS

Flock to the Tailsman Shop, where you can peck out upgrades to give your units a winning edge. Strap on Swift Spurs to your chicken-at-arms for extra speed, or arm your crossbowers with Toxic Eggs to poison enemies with every arrow. Get ready to ruffle some feathers and rule the roost!
